snippet.title: Truck Driver: The American Dream | Brave Girl Update
snippet.description:
Truck Driver: The American Dream is now available! #TruckDriver #simulationgames #trucksimulator 
 
The trucking adventure keeps rolling! Truck Driver®: The American Dream 'Brave Girl' Update is finally here and packed with loads of fresh content — all for free!
 
Embark on an epic journey alongside 'Brave Girl' and enjoy 6 to 7 hours of gameplay. Discover exciting additions, enhancements, and unlock a variety of fresh options for an upgraded trucking experience!
 
Main landing page: https://www.soedesco.com/games/truck-driver-the-american-dream
 
Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/soedesco
 
#TruckDriverGame #TruckDriver #Sim #Simulation #Casual #StoryRich #Adventure #FamilyFriendly #Truck #Trucks #Truckers #TruckingGame #SOEDESCO #TheAmericanDream #TruckDriverTheAmericanDream #TruckingXbox
 
About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.
 
Our portfolio consists of titles such as #petitIsland, #lemoncake, #bunnypark, #airoheart, #monstercrown, #owlboy, #saintkotar , as well as original SOEDESCO IPs #truckdriver, #Adam’sVenture, #realfarm  and #dollhouse.‍
